ModMetadata.Name: WebDisplayCore [StationeersMods]
ModMetadata.Author: SunsetFi and WIKUS
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]StationHMI[/h1] [b]WARNING:[/b] This mod has several dependencies beyond what it includes: - StationeersMods: https://github.com/jixxed/StationeersMods - StationeersWebDisplayCore: https://github.com/SunsetFi/stationeers-web-display
Missing any of these mods will cause this mod to not work correctly.
This is a mod that adds support for creating terminals and screens in-game that can render web pages and other web content. On its own, it provides no constructable items, but it does provide the core functionality for other mods to build on.
Mods that use this core: - StationHMI: HMI status and control screens for logic devices - https://github.com/SunsetFi/stationeers-web-hmi
